rows.name: Development Experience and Knowledge
cells: Extensive experience of programming languages
At least 1.5 years of relevant development experience, including UML, Modeling and Design skills.
At least 3 years of relevant development experience, including UML, Modeling and Design skills, and expert knowledge of at least one technical area
At least 5 years of relevant development experience, including UML, Modeling and Design skills, and expert knowledge of at least one technical area
At least 7 years of relevant development experience, including UML, Modeling and Design skills, expert knowledge of at least one technical area, and ability to coach and train other developers.

rows.name: Performance Optimization Experience and Knowledge
cells: Not expected to have prior experience
Expected to have spent at least 1 year as a Performance Analyst
Expected to have at least 3 years Performance Analyst experience. Able to define, estimate and execute the task related to the special domain
Expected to have at least 5 years Performance Analyst experience. Should represent the professional authority for the special domain
Expected to have at least 7 years Performance Analyst experience. Should represent the professional authority for the special domain

rows.name: Software Process Knowledge
cells: Not expected to have knowledge or experience of QA processes
Expected to be able to follow and understand a defined QA process
Expected to be able to follow, understand and enhance a defined QA process
Expected to be able to follow, understand, actively influence and enhance a defined QA process
Expected to be able to define QA processes

rows.name: Design and Documentation Skills
cells: Able to read and understand project and requirement documentation
Able to read and understand project and requirement documentation; able to create documentation and test reports
Able to read and understand project and requirement documentation; able to create project, test documentation and reports

Able to read and understand project and requirement documentation; able to create high-quality design, technical and project documentation; able to write high-quality test documentation and audit documentation

Able to read and understand project and requirement documentation; able to create high-quality design, technical and project documentation including documentation of his/her code; able to write high-quality use cases and audit documentation

rows.name: Job Title
cells: Junior Performance Analyst
Performance Analyst
Senior Performance Analyst
Lead Performance Analyst
Chief Performance Analyst

rows.name: Roles Played on a Project
cells: Plays the Performance Analyst or Tester role
Plays the Performance Analyst or Tester role
Plays the Key Performance Analyst or Designer or Key Tester role
Plays the Key Performance Analyst and Designer, Key Tester role, and usually also performs a Team Lead, Architect, Reviewer or Auditor role
Can play any role, typically a senior position. Responsibilities can include Performance Analyst, Key Tester, Team Lead, Architect, Reviewer, Auditor, Technical Trainer

rows.name: Reliability
cells: Expected to work effectively under supervision
Expected to work effectively without supervision
Expected to work independently without direct supervision and to guide the activities of the related professional team
Expected to work independently without direct supervision and to guide the activities of the related professional team
Expected to work independently without direct supervision and to guide the activities of the related professional team

rows.name: Quality
cells: Understands and follows the quality metrics
Understands and follows the quality metrics
Understands and follows the quality metrics
Understands and follows the quality metrics
Understands and follows the quality metrics

rows.name: Customer Relations
cells: Not expected to deal directly with customers
Not expected to deal directly with customers
Expected to participate in phone conferences; be interviewed by customers; visit customers with supervision
Expected to participate in phone conferences; be interviewed by customers; be involved in customer workshops and presentations; visit customers without supervision

Expected to have good customer relationship skills; participate in phone conferences; be interviewed by customers; be involved in customer workshops and presentations; visit customers without supervision

rows.name: Language Level in the Customer's Communication Language
cells: Able to read and understand the Customer's Communication Language
Able to read and write the Customer's Communication Language and have some speaking ability
Comfortably able to read and write and speak the Customer's Communication Language
Comfortably able to read, write and speak the Customer's Communication Language; able to write high-quality unambiguous texts
Totally fluent in the spoken and written variants of the Customer's Communication Language; able to write high-quality unambiguous texts
